summary.p: GatherFields glues any number of input fields into one output field.

description.p: GatherFields takes in an arbitrary number of input fields and gathers them all up into one output field. If the input fields all have the same editable mesh type then the output field will also be of the same type. If the meshes are not editable or of different mesh types then only their points will be gathered up and a single PointCloudField will be produced.

The mesh type is not preserved for non-editable mesh types such as LatVolFields because they cannot be arbitrarily glued together while maintaining their mesh type. Run the fields through the module before passing them into GatherFields if you want the element structure to be preserved.

net.title: GatherFields-pcmerge Regression Test
net.p: Read in two PointCloudFields and extract all of the node points from both of them into a new PointCloud using the GatherFields module.
This network can be found at src/nets/Modules/FieldsCreate/GatherFields-pcmerge.net.
